name: Smackball (itch)
description:
Smackball is what you get when you fuse tennis, squash and air-hockey into a competitive video game. Play in fast-paced 1v1 matches against your friends, the AI, or anyone. Smack your way to victory!

The rules are simple: smack the ball across half court before your timer runs out, and try to score a goal against your opponent!

Features:

  • Play locally, against your friends or the AI.
  • 5 different game modes.
  • 8 color palettes to personalize the look of the game.
  • Customize the gameplay and create your own game modes.

Steam Version:

  • This purchase comes with a Steam key. Activating the game on Steam gives you access to the online multiplayer. 
  • Invite your Steam friends to private matches, or match up against a random player!

Note: You’ll need at least one controller for local multiplayer matches.
